text: Heydar Aliyev International Airport (IATA: GYD, ICAO: UBBB) is the international airport in Azerbaijan. It is 20 km (12 mi) northeast of the capital city Baku. The airport is the home of Azerbaijan Airlines (AZAL). Runways: 2,700x60m (8,858 ft) Asphalt, 3,200x45m (10,499 ft) Asphalt/Concrete == Other websites == * Heydar Aliyev International Airport Renovation Project * Baku International Airport Official Website Category:Buildings and structures in Azerbaijan Category:Airports in Asia Category:Airports in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Baku Category:Public transport in Azerbaijan Category:Tourism in Azerbaijan
title: Heydar Aliyev International Airport
